desc: 30 calories, 5g of Sugar, 900mg of Electrolytes. Try a new type of hydration beverage that is low-sugar, low-calorie, and packed with all-natural electrolytes, adaptogens, and nootropics – like ocean minerals, magnesium, vitamin D3, L-Theanine, GABA, and Lemon Balm – for a less stressed, more focused you.

layout.text: Crafted with electrolytes, adaptogens, and nootropics for focus & mental clarity.
